a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Open defecation in rural areas vs. urban areas, 2022
Open defecation refers to defecating in the open, such as in fields, forests, bushes, open bodies of water, on
beaches, in other open spaces, or disposed of with solid waste.
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP) (2024)
